title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
content: JavaScript closures are functions that have access to their outer function's scope, even when the outer function has returned.
author: John Doe

title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
content: CSS Grid and Flexbox are both powerful layout systems, but they serve different purposes and are used in different contexts.
author: Jane Smith

title: Introduction to React
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It's maintained by Facebook and a community of developers.
author: Meta Llama
